Text:
Its almost like I Am Legend! 
It looks like a Bmovie wanna be!!!
No "I am Legend" is almost like this.  This is a remake of the Original "I am Omega" which WAS the original "I am Legend".
Actually, Omega Man was a remake of Last Man on Earth...

actually this is an asylum movie... a company made famous by making low-budget versions of blockbuster movies and releasing them just before the blockbuster...
movies like "transmorfers" "aliens vs hunter" and  such... 
thats not to say that i am legend, i am omega, omega man and last  man on earth arent all movie versions of the same book... but theyre not really "remakes" or "copies" of eachother...

tis is a B movie tho... no doubt about it (its what theyre famous for and proud of)
they also made Snakes on a Train hehehe... quite famous movie actually... almost as well known as snakes on a plane.

it can't be as bad as "I AM LEGEND" and i am only guessing here that none of these two movies has much in common with the awesome book "Iam legend" or the superior movie "Last man on earth" - so why am i DL:ing this one?
Well - i like Troma movies and *hey* let's face it - B-Movies are so much better than 150million dollars crap movies!

Oh man this sucked... Everything failed as much as it could, btw who called this a b-movie? I'd say d... For instance, not even the timer on the bomb was working, it was couting upwards instead of down... FAiL lol
forgot to diss the subs, they were also the worst ive ever seen, they were really, really, bad. I promise, you don't wanna watch this crap.
